Summary: Light very bright pulsing every 5 secs with dull red lights pulsing very dim.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Joppa
There were no other sightings in Joppa on or around October 11th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsWatched a very bright welding like light pulsing every 5 sec or so. Noticed the light at 8:45 pm After noticing it was staying in a general area I run in the house and told wife and child UFO ( they came out and witnessed it also.) wife went in house got the binoculars and I watched the lights untill 9:10 when they had went to far into space to see any longer. The light moved around in a big not so round circle and then a not so straight line untill to faint to see.
